gamepad_get_button_threshold: This function can be used to detect the current threshold setting of the analogue buttons for a given device. The default threshold for all analogue buttons is 0.5, with the range being from 0 to 1. The threshold defines at what point the button is considered as being "pressed" for games that require them to act as a digital button.
The above code checks the analogue button threshold of the gamepad connected to device "slot" 0 and if it is not the default value of 0.5, it is set to that value.
